name: ZillaKami
description: '''Junius Donald Rogers''' (born September 20, 1998), professionally known as '''ZillaKami''', is an American singer, rapper, songwriter, and notable contributor to the [[trap metal]] sub-genre. He is a member of the [[hip hop|hip-hop]] duo [[City Morgue]], consisting of rapper [[SosMula]], and was also a former songwriter for rapper [[6ix9ine]].
